response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe aligns perfectly with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will significantly contribute to your success. Considering its worth to both us and you, I propose a purchase price of $750,000. This offer reflects my intention to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction while maximizing the value for both parties involved. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss this further. Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 750000}
